alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 29 at 3:31AM MDT until May 29 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 285 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA LYON OSCEOLA IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MINNESOTA COTTONWOOD JACKSON LINCOLN LYON MURRAY NOBLES PIPESTONE ROCK IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA BROOKINGS MOODY IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA LINCOLN MINNEHAHA THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BROOKINGS, CANTON, FLANDREAU, FULDA, GEORGE, HARRISBURG, HENDRICKS, INWOOD, IVANHOE, JACKSON, LAKE BENTON, LAKEFIELD, LARCHWOOD, LENNOX, LUVERNE, MARSHALL, MOUNTAIN LAKE, PIPESTONE, ROCK RAPIDS, SIBLEY, SIOUX FALLS, SLAYTON, TEA, TYLER, WINDOM, AND WORTHINGTON. THIS ALSO INCLUDES THE TRIBAL LANDS OF THE FLANDREAU SANTEE SIOUX TRIBAL NATION.
